dt.t: she's very {it}particular{/it} about the cleanliness of her car

dt: of, relating to, or belonging to a single person

dt.t: he's {it}particular{/it} about the corn he buys
a very {it}particular{/it} account of the breakdown of their marriage from the husband's perspective

shortdef: of, relating to, or belonging to a single person

dt: a separate part in a list, account, or series

dt.t: requested a bill of {it}particulars{/it} for the care he received in the hospital
everyone wanted to know all the {it}particulars{/it} about the forthcoming merger

shortdef: a separate part in a list, account, or series

dt: in the specific case of one person or thing as distinguished from others

dt.t: She prefers white wine, {it}in particular{/it} Pinot Grigio.

dt: in regard to something mentioned explicitly or in detail

dt.t: Do you have anything {it}in particular{/it} in mind for dinner tonight?
